ComicInfo.Summary:
You Only Die Twice: Deadpool tracks down Arnim Zola and has to take on a horde of clones he has created of the lamest dead folks the Marvel Universe has to offer.
Dead Reckoning Part 3: What the World Needs Now: In the desert sands of Egypt, Deadpool does what even Captain America in a Landau, Luckman and Lake battle suit can't--he accepts his destiny as a hero, steps up to the plate and saves the universe from a cosmic messiah who offers peace at the price of giving up free will and change. Dixon goes nuts in the aftermath and Zoe takes over LL & L as she writes Deadpool off as a loss.
Dead Reckoning Part 2: 2nd Stringers & Dead Ringers: With Deadpool dead, Dixon convinces Captain America to become the Mithras and fight Tiamat. Tiamat contacts his people and tells them that the Mithras is dead. Zoe and Al find that they have survived the explosion of DP's apartment but Pool is nowhere to be found. Gerry contacts Zoe and reveals that he is the lost partner of Landau, Luckman & Lake. The Watcher watches in horror as a giant alien abomination moves in on earth.
Dead Reckoning Part 1: Deadpool takes on his destined role as the Mithras by tracking down the alien monster Tiamat and engaging him in battle. Zoe realizes that DP has been predetermined to lose and tries to warn him, but Dixon pulls the plug. An injured Deadpool escapes and limps home, little knowing that a bomb has been planted in his house. Zoe races to his aid but is caught in the explosion with DP and Al. Knowing in advance of Pool's failure, Dixon calls in his second string, Captain America.
Dead Reckoning Minus One Month & Counting: Great Men: Zoe and Monty pop in on DP and Al for a surprise visit. Pool tries to visit Siryn and get a little clarity before his big role as savior of the world but ends up fighting Cable instead. Dixon has Noah killed for asking too many questions about the Mithras Directive.
Dead Reckoning Minus Two Months & Counting: Smells Like Prologue: Zoe tries to get DP ready to become the Mithras and battle Tiamat by setting him up with battle armor but Pool rejects the suit in favor of his own mad merc skills. Noah and Dixon have words about Monty's mind wipe. Gerry visits Doc Strange and discusses the coming conflict.
Justice, Order, & Luck (or...Skinless Drooler's Day Off!): Deadpool takes Monty to Monte Carlo where he uses the precog's powers to make a fortune and cheat Batroc out of millions. Monty is surprised to find that he has a wonderful time but big bad boss Dixon isn't happy about the excursion and decides to erase it from his memory.
Payback Part Two: The Quick and the Dead: Deadpool has a final showdown with Ajax.
Payback Part One: Karmic Relief: Deadpool tries to save Killebrew and Ilaney from Ajax.
Deadpool/Death '98: A Kiss, A Curse, A Cure: Ajax kills Deadpool. Pool is visited by his old flame Death as his life flashes before his eyes and he recalls how he was transformed by Dr. Killebrew of the Weapon X project from a cancer riddled merc to the cold and crazy Deadpool. Pool forsakes Death for revenge against his old enemy Ajax.
